RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>25-34</age> <treatment_length>1 to 6 months</treatment_length> <satisfaction>1</satisfaction> <effectiveness>2</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Defective Internal Secretion of Ovaries</condition> <comment>I was on Junel for 5 months & my periods would be light spotting for 2 weeks straight. It did a great job at preventing pregnancy mainly because I felt like I was always on my period. I never had any other side effects. But having your period every 2 weeks was bad enough.</comment>

INTENDED_EFFECT.text: did a great job at preventing pregnancy

SIDE_EFFECT.text: felt like I was always on my period
